page.title: 16Tuesday with Nicola
page.content:
On Tuesday I get up at about 7.50am. I have Rice Krispies and a cup of tea. I watch TV-am for about 15 minutes. At about 8.20am I get ready for school. Then,at about 8.30am,I go to let my one duck and my nine chickens out. After that I come back from the chicken pen and put my coat on.At 8.50am I set out for school.My mother takes me in the car because I live quite a long way from the school. School starts at 9.00am. At 9.05am we go into assembly where we sing Welsh hymns.During the morning we do Maths, PE,English and we go out to play rounders.At 12 noon we go home for lunch.At 1.30pm we come back to school.Then we do sewing,singing together and reading cards.At 4.00pm we go home.
By Nicola Jones of Trefforest school
